camaradeputadosapi 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Representatives

Query data on representatives that are or once were in office.

deputados()

Get a list of representatives (current and historical)

deputados_despesas()

Get representative expenditures while in office for a given year

deputados_discursos()

Get representative speeches

deputados_eventos()

Get a list of events the representative was present

deputados_frentes()

Get a list of parliamentary fronts a representative is currently member

deputados_id()

Extract a representative Id

deputados_info()

Get general information for a representative

deputados_orgaos()

Get a list of bodies and commissions a representative is member

Events

Query data on events that occurred or are on schedule.

eventos()

Get a list of events that occurred or are on schedule at the House of Representatives

eventos_deputados()

Get a list of representatives that were in a specific event

eventos_info()

Get detailed information about a specific event

eventos_orgaos()

Get a list of bodies, commissions, agencies, etc. that organized an event

eventos_pauta()

Get a list of propositions that were or will be discussed in a given event

eventos_votacoes()

Get information for a voting event

Parliamentary fronts

Query data on parliamentary fronts.

frentes()

Get a list of parliamentary fronts

frentes_id()

Extract a parliamentary front Id

frentes_info()

Get general information about a parliamentary front

frentes_membros()

Get a list of members for a given parliamentary front

Legislative periods

Query data on legislative periods.

legislaturas()

GET a list of legislative periods

legislaturas_id()

Extract a legislative period id

legislaturas_info()

Get legislative period information

legislaturas_mesa()

Get information of speakers for the House of Representative for a given legislative period

Political Parties

Query data on political parties.

partidos()

Get a list of political parties that had or current have representatives in office

partidos_blocos()

Get a list of blocs in the current legislative term at the Brazilian House of Representatives

partidos_id()

Extract a Brazilian Political Party ID

partidos_info()

Get information about a Brazilian political party

partidos_membros()

Get a list of representatives that are or were in office for a given Brazilian political party

Propositions

Query data on propositions

proposicoes()

Get a list of propositions discussed in between a time interval

proposicoes_autores()

Get a list with authors of a given proposition

proposicoes_historico()

Get the historical record of a proposition at the House of Representatives

proposicoes_info()

Get detailed information about a proposition of Brazilian House of Representatives

proposicoes_relacionadas()

Get a list of propositions related to a given proposition

proposicoes_temas()

Get a list of thematic areas related to a given proposition

proposicoes_votacoes()

Get information on voting procedures of a proposition and that affected a proposition

Voting processes

Query data on voting proccess.

votacoes()

Get a list of voting processes

votacoes_info()

Get detailed information on voting processes

votacoes_orientacoes()

Get voting guideline for a political party on a given voting process

votacoes_votos()

Get information on representatives voting behavior for a given voting process

Bodies and Commissions

Query data on commissions and other legislative Bodies

orgaos()

Get a list of bodies and commissions

orgaos_eventos()

Get events that occurred or are on schedule for a given body or commission in between a time interval

orgaos_id()

Extract an unique identifier for a given body or commission

orgaos_info()

Get information on a Brazilian House of Representatives body or commission

orgaos_membros()

Get a list of positions of representatives on a body or commission

orgaos_votacoes()

Get information on voting procedures in a body or commission

References

Query metadata for data on deputados_(), eventos_(), orgaos_() and proposicoes_()

referencias_deputados()

Get metadata information on data related to the family 'deputados'

referencias_eventos()

Get metadata information on data related to the family 'eventos'

referencias_orgaos()

Get metadata information on data related to the family 'orgaos'

referencias_proposicoes()

Get metadata information on data related to the family 'proposicoes'
